casebody.data:
E.M.B.R., petitioner,
v.
S.M., et ux. No. 13-1270. Supreme Court of the United States June 30, 2014.

Case below, 414 S.W.3d 622 .

Motion of The Young Center for Immigrant Children's Rights, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Missouri, Southern District, denied.
